page.title: 01THE PEOPLE OF PORTCHESTER
page.content: The main part of this area concerns an attitudes survey conducted amongst various people living in Portchester. The questions we asked were: 1) Their name, age, occupation and social situation 2) How long they have lived in Portchester 3) What were their main problems in life 4) What are the main national problems and how would they solve them 5) What are the main local issues 6) What do they hope for in the future 7) What has this country most lost during their lifetime. The rest of this section is a general study on life in Portchester at the present.
